description: Structured parsed version of Riftbound Core Rules for easy implementation

golden_rule.description: Card text supersedes rules text. Whenever a card fundamentally contradicts the rules, the card's indication is what is true.

silver_rule.description: Card text uses different terminology than rules. Card text should be interpreted according to these rules, not as absolute.

board_zones.name: Base
board_zones.description: Player's starting zone where units and gear can be deployed

primary_win.description: When a player accrues Points equal to the Victory Score for their Mode of Play, they Win the game immediately.

scoring_methods.description: A player gains Control of a Battlefield they did not yet Score this turn.
A player maintains Control of a Battlefield during their Beginning Phase.

final_point_restriction.description: When a player tries to earn a Point through a Score, and their current Point Total is 1 point from the Victory Score, the following occurs:
final_point_restriction.conquer_condition: Must have Scored every Battlefield this turn

burn_out.description: Burning Out is an action a player must perform if they attempt to move one or more cards from their Main Deck to any other zone in excess of the number of cards remaining in their Main Deck.

process.action: Performs as much of the prescribed action as possible
Recycles their trash into their Main Deck (randomized)
Chooses an opponent to gain 1 point
Completes the remainder of the action that caused them to burn out

burn_out.consequence: Opponent gains 1 Victory Point per Burn Out
burn_out.victory_loss_condition: Repeated Burn Outs will result in them burning out repeatedly, giving 1 point to an opponent each time, until an opponent passes the Victory Score and wins the game.

phases.name: Draw Phase
actions: Perform Burn Out if deck is empty

phases.name: Action Phase
phases.description: Discretionary Actions phase where player can play spells, activate abilities, move units

steps.name: End of Turn Cleanup
steps.action: Special Cleanup with heal all units

steps.name: Expiration Step
steps.action: All 'this turn' effects expire, Rune Pools empty

combat_system.overview: Combat occurs when a Cleanup occurs, there are no items on the Chain, and a Battlefield has Units controlled by two opposing players.

actions: Establish Attacker (player whose units applied Contested status) - gains Focus
Finalize Initial Chain if triggered abilities exist

process.action: Sum Might of all Attacking Units
Sum Might of all Defending Units
Attacker assigns damage equal to their summed Might among Defender's units
Defender assigns damage equal to their summed Might among Attacker's units

damage_assignment_rules.lethal_damage_definition: Non-zero damage equaling or exceeding the Might of a Unit

actions: Perform Combat Cleanup (special cleanup with heal all units, recall attackers if defenders remain, remove designations)
If no Showdown or Combat staged, player with remaining units Establishes Control
Result in Conquer if battlefield not yet scored this turn

grants_during: Neutral Open State during Action Phase
Showdown State when player gains Focus
Closed State when player controls next Chain item

focus.description: Permission to take Discretionary Actions during Showdown Open State

chain.description: Queue system for cards and abilities
steps: Step 3: Pass priority to next player
Step 4: Resolve newest item on Chain

contested.description: Status applied to Battlefields when units from a new player arrive
contested.initiates: Showdown or Combat depending on circumstances

accelerate.function: As you play me, you may pay [1] and 1 Power as an additional cost. If you do, I enter ready.

action.function: Can be played/activated during Showdowns on any player's turn

assault.function: While I am an attacker, I have +X [M]

deathknell.trigger: When permanent is killed and sent to trash

deflect.function: Spells and abilities an opponent controls that choose me cost [X] more Power to play

ganking.function: I may move to a battlefield from another battlefield

hidden.function: Can hide facedown at a battlefield you control, play next turn for [0]

legion.function: If you have played another Main Deck card before this one this turn, apply [Text]

reaction.function: Can be played/activated during Closed States on any player's turn

shield.function: While I am a defender, I have +X [M]

tank.function: I must be assigned lethal damage before any other unit with same controller without Tank

temporary.function: At the start of this permanent's controller's Beginning Phase, before scoring, kill this

vision.function: When this is played, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.

equip.function: [Cost]: Attach this gear to a unit you control

quick_draw.function: [Reaction] When you play this, attach it to a Unit you control

repeat.function: You may pay [Cost] as an additional cost. If you do, execute the spell's instructions one additional time.

weaponmaster.function: When you play me, choose an Equipment you control. Pay its Equip cost reduced by [A] to attach it to me.

current_mode.name: 1v1 (Match)

setup.description: Each player selects one of their three Battlefields. The other two are set aside and will not be used for this round of play. The selected Battlefields are placed in the Battlefield Zone.
setup.after_each_game: The Battlefields that were used are removed and not selected again for this Match. One of the remaining Battlefields that were set aside must be chosen instead.

current_mode.first_turn_process: The player going second channels an extra Rune from their Rune Deck during their first Channel Phase of the game.

priority_order: Implement win conditions first (Victory Score and Burn Out)
Implement combat system and damage assignment

critical_rules.name: Victory Score Win Condition
critical_rules.description: Check at start of every Cleanup

critical_rules.name: Burn Out
critical_rules.description: Triggers when attempting to draw from empty deck, opponent gains 1 point

critical_rules.name: Combat Damage Assignment
critical_rules.description: Lethal damage must be assigned first, cannot overkill until all units assigned

critical_rules.name: Chain and Stack
critical_rules.description: Queue system for cards and abilities
